edge: Adarsh Gourav portrays the character of Balram Halwai, also known as 'Ashok Sharma'.
Rajkummar Rao plays the role of Ashok Shah, who is Balram's master.
Priyanka Chopra Jonas acts as Pinky Shah, who is Ashok's wife.
Mahesh Manjrekar portrays the character of The Stork, who is Ashok's father.
Vijay Maurya plays the role of Mukesh 'The Mongoose' Shah, who is Ashok's older brother.
Kamlesh Gill portrays the character of Granny Kusum, who is Balram's grandmother.
Swaroop Sampat acts as The Great Socialist.
Vedant Sinha plays the character of Dharam, who is Balram's nephew.
Nalneesh Neel portrays the character of Vitiligo Man in the movie.
